reviews.comment: Exceptional attention to detail, the laundry was folded neatly and pressed perfectly.
Convenient and hassle-free, using this laundry service saved me a lot of time and effort.
I had to wait hours for my laundry to be ready. It was a huge inconvenience.
Horrible experience, my clothes were not even sorted properly and ended up getting damaged.
Convenient and hassle-free, using this laundry service saved me a lot of time and effort.
I will never use this laundry service again after they lost a pair of my expensive pants.
I will never use this laundry service again after they lost a pair of my expensive pants.
The quality of their work is subpar at best, I would not recommend this laundry service to anyone.
